other_users_can_run_this_conformanche_ch: other users can run this conformanche check
Custom_check_form_description:
Submit your own conformance test to be included in your organization's credimi dashboard.
You can define test metadata and provide configuration as a YAML file or inline code.
Start_a_new_conformance_check_descriptio: Here you can start multiple conformance check, using multiple test suites - at once.

Edit your organization's information to better represent your services and products on
			the marketplace

code_configuration_is_edited_fields_are_: YAML configuration is manually edited. Fields are disabled.
verifier_field_description_name: Enter the name of the verifier: the name will be visible in the marketplace

use_case_verification_field_description_: Enter the description of the verification use case (Markdown supported)
Enter the deeplink (verification request) that is used to generate the QR Code and start the use case verification
Select one or more credentials that can be verified using this verification use case
Check this checkbox to publish the use case verification to the marketplace

import_new_credential_issuer_description: Import a new credential issuer by providing its URL. This will create a new issuer record, fetch the issuer's well-known metadata and automatically discover available credentials. If the URL already exists in your organization, you'll be given the option to use the existing one.
Rename_organization_warning: If you rename your organization, you will lose visibility of all your previous test runs (because the organization's internal namespace will be changed). Are you sure you want to proceed?
forgot_password_description: Please enter here your email to recover your password.

save_pipeline_description: Before saving, add some metadata to your pipeline.
